data.text: What a pleasant stay we had at Voco ! We felt a very heart warming welcome thanks to the receptionist Swam and his team. It was short but we enjoyed the ambiance, the rooftop and the amazing food. I would definitely return here next time. Thank you !
data.title: Exceptional hospitality and ambiance

data.text: Rooms are fantastic, they are clean, comfortable and very spacious. The foot at the hotel is brilliant, they offer everything and the chef is fantastic. The service is world class they are friendly, quick and helpful, special shoutout to Rojean for her fantastic service in the restaurant. The rooftop pool is awesome. Voco is a must stay best hotel in the best location
data.title: Best stay in the best location

data.text: Great breakfast at voco hotel palm jumeriha dubai. Excellent service from the staff. Rojean, Anu, Dioseth, Farha, Ruby, Runa, Chef Prabin Chef James sheila and Khamrul. Would highly recommend the breakfast during any stay at the voco hotel
data.title: Great Breakfast

data.text:
Good Hotel on Palma with its own beach. Good food, we took half board.  Some may find it monotonous, but the portions are excellent.  The rooms are cleaned every day.  Friendly staff.
Thanks to Bidan Das for helping us with the pool location :)))
data.title: Vacations for two.

data.text:
We stayed at the Voco on West beach for 3 days on our return to the UK. 
The hotel is very new and is well appointed. Great decor and pictures throughout.
We arrived around 4am, having booked the hotel for an extra night we checked in straight away. Swam , extremely friendly and helpful member of staff ,checked us in brought our bags up to our room. 
We had booked corner room with beach view looking over West beach. 
The room had all that you would need, hairdryer, iron/ ironing board , kettle, TV,Nespresso machine , complimentary water and the most amazing smelling toiletries.
The bed was really comfortable, the room was cleaned daily, water was replenished daily , towels changed daily. Housekeeping staff did a fantastic job.
The restaurant on site MM served all you could possibly want for breakfast,fruits, pastries, juices,cooked breakfast etc…
 We ate at the restaurant for dinner one night the food was also great.
The hotel has a rooftop pool and here you get a great view towards Ain Dubai. It also has loungers on the beach for hotel guests. 
The main thing at the hotel for me was the staff .. everyone seems genuinely interested in you, asking about your day ,remembering where you said you would visit  that day , what your doing etc… 
Overall a superb hotel.
data.title: Short stay

user_location.name: Newcastle upon Tyne, Tyne and Wear, England

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Maisy11,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at voco Dubai The Palm. We are thrilled to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay with us.

It's wonderful to hear that you found our hotel to be well-appointed and enjoyed the great decor and pictures throughout. We strive to create a welcoming and comfortable environment for all our guests, and it sounds like we succeeded in doing so during your visit.

We are delighted that our hosts, especially Swam, made such a positive impression on you. Providing exceptional service is at the core of what we do, and we will be sure to pass along your kind words to the entire team. It's fantastic to hear that you felt genuinely cared for and that our hosts went above and beyond to make your stay memorable.

We're also pleased to hear that you enjoyed your corner room with a beach view and found it to be well-equipped with all the amenities you needed. Our housekeeping team works hard to ensure that our guests have a comfortable and clean environment throughout their stay, and we're glad that you noticed their efforts.

It's great to hear that you enjoyed the dining options at our restaurant, MM, and that you found the food to be delicious. We're also happy that you were able to take advantage of our rooftop pool and beach loungers, and that you appreciated the stunning views.

Thank you again for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your feedback. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to voco Dubai The Palm. 

Warm regards,

Charles Godot
General Manager
owner_response.author: voco Dubai The Palm
